message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product I think you'll be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $120 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $135.  This is a great deal on a fantastic product!
I appreciate your flexibility, but $110 is the most I can offer. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $110 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $125. This is a fair price for a product that will be valuable to you.
I'm still interested in the product, but $115 is the most I can offer. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
